# ⚙️ GitHub Actions Workflows

This folder contains CI/CD automation workflows.

## Planned Workflows

- **`build-images.yml`** - Automatically build and test Docker images
- **`security-scan.yml`** - Scan for vulnerabilities in dependencies
- **`lint-code.yml`** - Check code quality and formatting

---

## Coming Soon

Workflows will be added once the challenge infrastructure is complete.
